fields.name: Bot description
fields.value:
This bot was crated for fun, he's oriented rpg especialy lg.
Every commands start by `{bot}`.
Replace `[...]` by following instruction, dont write [] but respect contained syntax.

fields.name: Comands list
fields.value:
- `{bot}help` >> Display bot help tool.
- `{bot}ping` >> Ping request for test bot.
- `{bot}[n]d[x]` >> Roll n in range [1,x].
- `{bot}pp` >> Send your profile picture.
- `{bot}{botn}[\{lg}, {role}, {zeub}, {jrpg}] newPrefix` >> will change specifed bot prefix (main one defaultly)

fields.name: __**Intro**__
fields.value:
Every lg commands use `{bot}{lg}` as prefix.
- Replace `[...]` by the contained instruction, [argument ...] mean you can use this command with multiple arguments.
- Be carreful, respecte spaces and quoting, `\` mean this command can work without argument.

fields.name: __**Game Commands**__
fields.value:
- `{bot}{lg}start[\n]` >> Lunch the game with n cards (1 without n).
- `{bot}{lg}end` >> End current game.
- `{bot}{lg}vote` >> Show vote options.
- `{bot}{lg}kill [@player]` >> Substract 1 to mentionned player hp counter

fields.name: __**Player Commands**__
fields.value:
- `{bot}{lg}padd [@player ...]` >> Add to current player list following players.
- `{bot}{lg}pset [@player ...]` >> Erease current list and replace it by following players.
- `{bot}{lg}plist` >> Bot send in this channel players list.
- `{bot}{lg}pclear` >> Reset current players list.
- `{bot}{lg}patt[n]` >> Attribute role, without start game, and send to each players his own one.
- `{bot}{lg}plifeset[n]` >> Set all players life to n.

fields.name: __**Cards Commands**__
fields.value:
- `{bot}{lg}cclear[n]` >> Reset nth cards list.
- `{bot}{lg}cset[n] ["card name", ...]` >> Set nth cards list with following cards.
- `{bot}{lg}cadd[n] ["card name", ...]` >> Add to nth cards list following cards.

fields.name: Intro
fields.value: Every role comands use `{bot}{role}` as prefix.

fields.name: Comands list
fields.value:
- `{bot}{role}list` >> Send in this channel the role list of the serveur.
- `{bot}{role}send [$Role$ ...] message` >> send the each role owner the message specified.

fields.name: Intro
fields.value: Every jdr-zeub comands use `{bot}{zeub}` as prefix.

fields.name: Comands list
fields.value:
- `{bot}{zeub}charlist` >> Send in this chanel every characteres list.
- `{bot}{zeub}charsheet[n]` >> Send in this channel specified character sheet (charlist to know index [n])
